text: Kiyamatera jnana sudhu allahara kache'i pratyabartita haya. Tamra ajnatasare kono phala abarana hate bera haya na, kono nari garbha dharana kare na ebam santana'o prasaba kare na [1]. Ara yedina allah taderake deke balabena, 'amara sarikera kothaya?' Takhana tara balabe, 'amara apanara kache nibedana kari ye, e byapare amadera theke kono saksi ne'i
